{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.24337v1", "title": "On gradient $ρ$-Einstein solitons with Bach tensor radially
  nonnegative", "summary": "In this paper, we study $n$-dimensional gradient $\rho$-Einstein solitons
whose Bach tensor is radially nonnegative. Under this assumption, we show that
such $\rho$-Einstein solitons are locally warped products of an interval and an
Einstein manifold, provided either $\rho\neq0$ or $\rho=0$ and the soliton is
rectifiable. We obtain as a consequence that these solitons must have harmonic
Weyl tensor and vanishing Bach tensor. We also finish the classification of
complete locally conformally flat steady $\rho$-Einstein solitons and classify
these manifolds when their Bach tensor is radially nonnegative and
$n\in\{3,4\}$.", "main_category": "math.DG", "categories": "math.DG", "published": "2025-03-31T17:22:47Z"}
